name: Pittu
description: Steamed cylinders of rice flour and coconut
instructions: Mix rice flour with water to get breadcrumb consistency
Layer rice flour and coconut in pittu maker
Serve with curry or banana and sugar
cultural_notes: Traditional breakfast, can be eaten sweet or savory
description_sinhala: සහල් පිටි සහ පොල් තැම්බූ සිලින්ඩර
description_tamil: அரிசி மாவு மற்றும் தேங்காய் வேகவைத்த சிலிண்டர்கள்
cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික උදෑසන ආහාරය, පැණිරස හෝ රසවත් ලෙස අනුභව කළ හැකිය
cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய காலை உணவை இனிப்பு அல்லது காரமாக உண்ணலாம்
